mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_mst2 VALUES (0, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_roles}, #{user_provider}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT sm.user_code, sm.user_name, sm.user_email, sm.user_id, sm.user_password, sm.user_roles, sm.user_provider, dm.user_profile_img, dm.user_address, dm.user_phone, dm.user_gender FROM user_mst2 sm LEFT OUTER JOIN user_dtl dm ON (sm.user_code = dm.user_code) WHERE sm.user_id = #{username}
